name: change-series-settings
description: Change visualization settings for series on cartesian charts. Include all properties in each series settings object, but set properties you do not want to change to null.

series_settings.description: Settings for series. Include all properties for each series you want to change. Set properties that should remain unchanged to null.

key.description: The series key in series_settings map.

color.description: The color of the series. Use colors from the color palette only. If asked for a specific color, select the closest match from the palette.

show_series_values.description: Whether to show the series values.

axis.description: Set the Y-axis of the series to left or right.

line.size.description: Set the thickness of a line series.

line.style.description: Set the style of the line.

line.interpolate.description: Set the interpolation method for lines and areas.

line.marker_enabled.description: Set whether to show the marker on line and area series.

line.missing.description: Set how to handle missing data points.
